attributes.review: Well I got this app expecting the best. Later I realized that it is trash, I do not know how it’s still on the App Store. First it kept glitching  and crashing my phone, Second it took absolutely to long to download, causing a lost of interest. I would absolutely not recommend and also recommend voting for Biden for this reason.
attributes.title: I WOULD MOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO PEOPLE WHO SUPPORT TRUMP.

attributes.review: I was hoping this app would provide ways to help make our country a better place & not just a way to give the presidents fan club a new platform to buy merchandise. Please take this app down as it is a disgrace to our country, our citizens, & what we stand for as a united land.
attributes.title: Completely Disappointed

attributes.review: i was scrolling through tiktok as i do everyday and i came across this video saying how great this app is, so i downloaded it and it's the stupidest thing ever💕we don't like the big orange, neither should you luvs.  anyways no one likes trump and if you do ur ugly and white💘and all the white people go back to ur country we don't want you here.  but POC LIVES MATTER✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: The main purpose of me downloading this app was to be Inspired by our incredible racist orange president🍊✨. There are a lot of fake reviews made by boomers who are brainwashed into thinking that he’s a good guy➖👄➖. But i’m trying to keep it 💯 yk and let the people know that this app doesn’t justify just how terrible🧚🏼‍♀️✨💖 the orange 🧡 power is, it’s honestly sad.
attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes ➖👄➖

attributes.review:
I open the app and I’m immediately terrified, who though it would be funny to put that- that- THING so that when you open the app it’s the first thing you see.

Anyway, I continue on with it but then my phone crashes, I try to open the app again but my phone is SO LAGGY!! I had to restart my phone and even then, that took F O R E V E R!!!!
attributes.title: What is this?

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it told me to put in my information so i did to see why i should vote for mr trump and once he kept calling me and calling me and texting me saying that he loved me then when i deleted the app i got a virus and i needed a new phone. once i got a new phone it kept going so i am asking for trump to give me a new phone
attributes.title: DONT DOWLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: this app is awful!!! it took forever to download to my phone and when it finally did i had to re-download because i couldn’t even open the app! whenever i finally got it open there was an audio that was blasting chats💕🥰, and even when i turned the volume down the audio would not stop. these chants brought in rats to my house. the rats then carried away my pet dog, and we had just gotten her too🧚!! and after all of that the app crashed and deleted from my phone and it wouldn’t let me download it again.✨
attributes.title: do not dow this app!!!😻🤩🤪✨💕

attributes.review: I wanted to be informed about my pressy poo so I downloaded this app. However, upon opening, a picture of Mr. Trump was pasted on the screen. My cat, looking over my shoulder, for reasons unknown, gagged so aggressively that she dislodged her jaw 😰😰 Poor Mrs. Applesauce of the South 🙏🙏 She is now in the hospital but recovering just fine ☺️Would not recommend if you like your jaw. Have a good night 😚
attributes.title: My cat was ✨hospitalized✨

attributes.review:
Me and my friend were doing ✨ight✨ until I find out that there is an app about the one and only 🟠✨Donald trump✨🟠and my friend was so excited about the app that she fainted. We took her to the hospital and she was fine she was just to ✨😵excited😵✨
For the lovely app that trump has. But not she has all dem ✨💉needles💉✨ in her so now we don’t likey da app.
attributes.title: My friend went to hospital 😖✨😵😻🧚🏻

attributes.review: It hacked my granny’s iphone and now she gotta buy a new one, she keep getting notifications about trump and she doesn’t even support him and every time I open the app it closes it and then my phone will freeze for like 3 minutes and I would have to completely shut down my phone
attributes.title: Worst app ever 😡😡😡
